long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Orion U-Verify for SAP Fieldglass by Stratesys - To Anglo American

Simplification and automation of analysis and management of workers documents.

U-Verify is a tool, integrated with SAP Fieldglass, to carry out automatic analysis of external workforce documentation. Intelligent and integrated management of workers, with rapid analysis of documents via machine learning and detection of inconsistencies, alerting workers and / or managers
